column5: A friend of mine won a full day on lake St-Clair with Guide Bob Devine (Chartertalk guide service) but he can't go , if anyboby is interested send me an MP i'll put you in contact with him...Day of your choice but it has to be a week day.   Tightline
I'll take it!!!!!  Hope you havent gave it away already.  Just had a baby girl and musky fishing has been on hold all month.  A day on LSC would be a great make up.  Steve

More details , he did not actually win the trip , he got it at an auction , value 500$ paid 200$ , so he expects 200$...  By accident i deleted a PM from one of who left me is phone number , send it again...

Let's face it, guided trips count for little next to nothing!!!... all you're doing is reeling in the guides fish for him!!!  Guides are prima donnas, they won't reel in fish, they won't clean weeds off the hook... all they wanna do is drive the dang boat!!!... HELL!, I can do THAT!!!!  If it was me, I'd ask they pay me 100$ to take the trip!!!

Really Shall we see if you Swarthy Chiseled features can hold up to abuse  You my southern friend are in need of a good session me barking at you You"ll understand what leaving your smiles on shore is for hahahahahahaha Just like Ceasar Milan,calm submissive behavior with NO Affection  You couldn't even drive strait if you had 40 gallons of Rum and Coke fueling the boat    :lol:  I might even show why green coach dogs my favorite flavor      :lol:  You might even end up speaking Canadian after your ordeal EH

Yeah, I knew that would get you going!  We do have something in common though, I don't pay people to bark at me... I get paid to bark at people!  If you want me to reel in that damn fish, you ask me to reel it in... and you ask me nicely!

LOL  guiding = babysitting  Guide: have you fished before? baby: yes! I am pretty good at it... Guide: alright, take this baitcaster, tie on this lure and go stand at the front. baby: how does this snap work? Guide: here, bring it over, SNAP, done ok now go at the front. baby: ok Guide: see the weed bed, throw the bait 5 feet off it to the right, as we work down weed line, and reel in as fast as you can. baby: ok * baby winds back (sideways) fires the bait in the air, half way through it goes pop, lure comes crashing down in the water* baby: what happened? Guide: backlash, give me the rod, quick. Guide: there! now try it again, keep your thumb on the spool this time *baby winds the rod back again swings the lure in the air.. * Guide: easy, keep off the weed b... *lure lands right in the weed bed*  Guide: ok let's go trolling  * FISH ON!*  Guide: pick up the rod Baby: ok ... ... Baby: the rod is stuck, I cant get it out of the holder!
Dang Loic, that almost describes my first trip with Marc to a T!
we were all babies once.  Actually, there are still some people that when I am with them I feel like a baby again!
Ill pony up 200 bucks and take the trip if it still available  Let me know.  Bryan
Maybe that is YOUR experience GCD...  it sure isn't mine.  I will charter on http://users.gtn.net/bnash/ again anytime... Barry and the guys are GREAT every time...
200$ in this economy are you crazy?

GCD,People pay me to bark at them When there wives call and ask me to make sure they feel like they are at home ..... I do  Was not sure if you were stewing Possum or RoadKill this morning  I am convinced it was RoadKill  Tks for the laugh  Look like some lucky guy might fish with Bob after all this fun and laughs  Tks for the laughs,you made my day yesterday  The Moon was Shinning on friday Eh
I had the opportunity to fish with Bob in the spring on the DR. He's a great guide had a blast. Love the Ranger boats as well

Musky fishing has been good this yr. In 2006 VHS hit the musky population hard but like always mother nature came back. We are seeing a lot of small fish 24"-30" and the ones that beat the virus are big, healthy and have an attitude(similiar to GCD) but muskies have teeth. LOL This trip could be casting, jigging or trolling. I will let the winners know what is best at that time.
If this is still available, I will take it, PM me.
